author: Don Syme
content: @tamizhvendan has a nice blog http://blog.tamizhvendan.in.  He's also author of "F# Applied" on web with F#+Suave http://products.tamizhvendan.in/fsharp-applied/

author: Roman Provazník
content: I bought this @tamizhvendan book about @SuaveIO few days ago and must say it is totally kick ass! #goodjob #fsharphttps://t.co/xuKRZbSKc0

author: Lay
content: I find F# Applied very well written. Thanks @tamizhvendan for a great job! (and a ;) for the @SuaveIO team)

author: Vicenç Garcia
content: I've just started reading @tamizhvendan book about @SuaveIO and F#. Really nice to start with you own implementation of #suave. #recommend

author: Vagif Abilov
content: F# Applied is a very good book. Teaches how to build Suave framework from ground up.

author: FSharpTV
content: If you want to power up your learning I'd suggest you take a look at this awesome book on f# #webdev

author: Serhii Kalinets
content: fantastic book. Just have bought it. #fsharp
